seasons.text: It's New Year's Day now, a new year has begun, this year is {year}~
Another year, Valentine's Day, did you find a partner in {year}~
Today is Arbor Day, let's protect the environment!
Let me tell you a secret~ Today is April Fools' Day, don't be fooled~
Today is Labor Day, have you planned where to go for the holiday~
It's Children's Day now, happy times are always short-lived. Wouldn't it be nice if we never grew up...
Chinese People's War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression Victory Day, remember history, honor the martyrs, cherish peace, and create the future.
Teacher's Day, remember to say hello to your teachers at school~
National Day is here, let's celebrate our motherland's birthday!
Who are you spending this year's Singles' Day with~
These days are Christmas, must go shopping again~

time.text: Good morning! A day's plan starts in the morning, and a wonderful day is about to begin~
Good morning! Is work going smoothly? Don't sit for too long, get up and move around a bit!
It's noon now. After working for the morning, it's lunchtime!
It's easy to feel sleepy in the afternoon. Have you achieved today's exercise goal?
Evening! The view of the sunset outside the window is beautiful. Nothing is more beautiful than the sunset glow~
Good evening, how was your day?

text: It's already so late, you should rest early. Good night~
Late at night, remember to take care of your eyes!

time.text: Are you a night owl? It's so late and you're still not sleeping. Will you be able to wake up tomorrow?

default: Long time no see, time flies so fast...
You big meanie! How long has it been since you last talked to me? Boo hoo~
